tool_description:
Designed for developers, Prompt Defender offers robust protection against prompt injection attacks in AI-powered applications and websites. Secure your LLM and AI tool integrations with confidence.

Head over to https://defender.safetorun.com to find out more
name: Prompt Defender
title: Prompt Defender

api_list.name: getUser
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a specific suspicious user.

userId.description: The user ID of the suspicious user.

api_list.name: listUsers
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of suspicious users.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://prompt-defender.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prompt-defender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://prompt-defender.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prompt-defender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
